Employee: You need to obtain permission from the payer (i.e. your employer) if you wish to do work for other payers. Note: Some employees can work for more than one employer at any one time.
Self-employed: You can provide the same services to more than one person / business at the same time.You advertise and maintain a visible business location. You are available to work in the relevant market.
